WHY_ME.TITLE: Why me
WHY_ME.DESCRIPTION:
I am motivated to continuously learn new technologies and develop myself.
My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make
me a valuable member of your team.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Skills
SKILLS.CHALLENGE: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.

PROJECTS.TITLE: My Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_SHARKIE: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to find coins and poisoned bottles to fight against the crazy orca.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_CRM: A CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system manages customer interactions, streamlines sales, and enhances customer service through data organization and communication tracking.

ABOUT.TITLE: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_RESPONSIVE: Here what my colleagues said about me.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact me
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Still not sure if I am the right person for your project? Contact me so I can reassure you. Let us work together.

FORM.NAME: Your Name
FORM.PRIVACY_POLICY_TEXT_2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
FORM.NAME_HINT: The name must have more than 2 letters, no numbers or special characters
FORM.EMAIL_HINT: Please enter a valid email address (e.g. example@domain.com)
FORM.MESSAGE_HINT: Your message must have at least 4 words
